sections.heading: Overview
content: Crystal Golden, also known as “Allergy Lifestyle Mom,” is a mother of two daughters who both have multiple food allergies. Not knowing the complexities of food allergies, she had to learn how to navigate and educate herself. Golden had to learn about the food allergy world while promoting inclusion in an active and social setting. She’s enthusiastic to share her experience to educate people with or without food allergies and has become an advocate for the cause. Golden lives in Fayetteville, GA, with her husband, two beautiful daughters, and newborn son. You can reach her on Instagram and YouTube .
